dict.acceptation: （木制）长凳，工作台；法官，法官席；（英国议会的）议员席；场边的运动员休息区；

sent.orig: Jackson believes returning Odom to the bench will improve require from the Bench Mob.
sent.trans: 禅师坚信把奥多姆放回板凳席将大大鼓舞板凳匪徒的士气。

sent.orig: First, the main force, team of the bench, the bench two teams of the tripartite confrontation.
sent.trans: 先是主力、替补一队、替补二队进行的三方对抗。

sent.orig: I want the doohickey in the middle of the bench.
sent.trans: 在板凳当中的那个，给你。Larry,这个东西是干什么用的？

sent.orig: He plunked himself down on the Bench.
Can he play or can be on the bench? At this moment we do not know.
sent.trans: 至于他能否进入比赛名单甚至能否上场，现在我还不能给你们确切答案。
